name: ePublishing
tag_list: publishing, cms, content-management, saas, cloud, wcms, ecommerce, hosted-solutions, epublishing, web-content-management, online-publishing, enterprise-content-management
overview:
ePublishing helps companies make more money online with the leading SaaS content management, community and eCommerce solution for publishers and media companies.

The cost-effective ePublishing enterprise platform integrates CMS, Workflow, eCommerce, Community, eMail Newsletters & SEO into a single taxonomy-based solution, all supported in the Cloud.

The ePublishing design & usability team ensures exceptional user interfaces - while the custom development team crafts your site and applications to exact specifications – all backed by 24/7 US-based customer service and support.

Focused on targeting relevant content to users and driving revenue - ePublishing’s on-demand dynamic publishing environment allows users to Create, Manage, Publish and Optimize Content, Users, Subscribers and Data through a single unified dashboard.

Unlike proprietary software, ePublishing works well with complementary systems, integrating with eMail Service Providers, Circulation Systems, Fulfillment Providers, Ad Servers, Video Players, and other providers that add value.

As more companies discover the value of moving essential business operations to the cloud, ePublishing delivers the highest quality design, content management platform, updates and service, all at a savings compared to other services.
